import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Button } from 'primereact/button'; import { Panel } from 'primereact/panel'; import Code from '../../components/Code'; import { RadioButton } from 'primereact/radiobutton'; const code = ` int num = 5; for (int i = 0; i < num; i++) { print("I have been called " + i + " times."); } `; function VariablesQuiz() { const [answer1, setAnswer1] = useState(null); const [answer2, setAnswer2] = useState(null); const [answer3, setAnswer3] = useState(null); const [answer4, setAnswer4] = useState(null); const [answer5, setAnswer5] = useState(null); var correctAnswer1 = 0; var correctAnswer2 = 0; var correctAnswer3 = 0; var correctAnswer4 = 0; var correctAnswer5 = 0; function CheckAnswers() { let correctCount = 0; if (answer1 == correctAnswer1) { correctCount = correctCount + 1; } if (answer2 == correctAnswer2) { correctCount = correctCount + 1; } if (answer3 == correctAnswer3) { correctCount = correctCount + 1; } if (answer4 == correctAnswer4) { correctCount = correctCount + 1; } if (answer5 == correctAnswer5) { correctCount = correctCount + 1; } console.log(correctCount); } return (

What will be the final output to the console?

setAnswer1(e.value)} checked={answer1 === 'answer1'}/>
